column2: "Judahen Jehoiakim n’ahendzi afe a otsia ebiasa no mu no
column3: na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar baa Jerusalɛm botuu hyɛɛ no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze Judahen Jehoiakim na Nyankopɔn fie nkɔɔpow no mu bi hyɛɛ ne nsa; na ɔsoae kɔr n’abosomfie wɔ Sinar asaase do: na ɔdze nkɔɔpow no baa no bosom akoradzedan no mu."
"Na ɔhen no kasaa kyerɛɛ ɔsomfopanyin Aspenaz
column3: dɛ ɔmfa Israelmba no mu binom mbra
column4: hɔn a wɔyɛ ahen asefo na ekunyin no;"

column2: "mberantsewa a wonndzii dzɛm
column3: na mbom hɔn ho yɛ fɛw
column4: na hɔn enyi atsew nyansa nyina mu
column7: na wɔfata dɛ wɔsom wɔ ɔhen no n’ahemfie; na ɔnkyerɛ hɔn ma wonsua Kaldeafo nwoma na kasa."

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmma hɔn ahendziban na ne nsa a ɔnom no bi daa daa nyina
column3: na wɔnnyɛn hɔn mfe ebiasa; na ɔno ekyir no wɔmbɔsom ɔhen no."

column2: "Na hɔn mu bi a wofi Judamba mu nye Daniel
"Na ɔsomfopanyin no totoo hɔn edzin: ɔtoo Daniel dzin Bɛltesasar; na ɔtoo Hanania dzin Sadrak; na ɔtoo Misael dzin Mesak; na ɔtoo Azaria dzin Abednego."
"Na Daniel suae wɔ n’akoma mu dɛ ɔremmfa ahendziban anaa ne nsa a ɔnom no nngu no ho fi: dɛm ntsi ɔserɛɛ ɔsomfopanyin no amma oeenngu no ho fi."
"Na Nyankopɔn maa Daniel nyaa ɔsomfopanyin no enyim enyimpa na ayamuhyehye."
"Na ɔsomfopanyin no see Daniel dɛ
column3: Musuro mo wura ɔhen a ɔahyehyɛ hom edziban na anondze: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na obohu hom enyim mbɔbɔmbɔbɔr akyɛn mberantsewa a wɔyɛ hom etsipɛmfo no? Hom reyɛ ma me tsir ato wɔ ɔhen enyim."

column2: "Nna Daniel see ɔsomfo a ɔsomfopanyin dze no esi Daniel
"Meserɛ wo
column3: sɔ wo nkowaa hwɛ dadu: na wɔmma hɛn fan ma yendzi

column2: "Nkyii so ma wɔnhwɛ hɛn enyim
column3: na hɔn so a wodzi ahendziban bi no hɔn enyim wɔ w’enyim: na mbrɛ ɔwoara ibohu no

column2: "Nna otsiee hɔn wɔ asɛm yi mu
"Na dadu ekyir no
column4: na hɔn honam yeyɛɛ abran seen mberantsewa a wodzii ahendziban no bi no nyinara."

column2: "Nna ɔsomfo no yii hɔn edziban
column3: na hɔn nsa a nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnom no fii hɔ

column2: "Na mberantsewa baanan yi dze
column4: na nwomasua na nyansa nyina mu enyitsew: na Daniel nyaa ntseasee wɔ enyido adzehu na adaaso nyinara mu."

column2: "Na da a ɔhen no hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa hɔn mbra no durii no
column3: ɔsomfopanyin no dze hɔn baa Nebukadenezar enyim."

column2: "Na ɔhen no nye hɔn twetwee nkɔmbɔ; na hɔn nyinara mu woennhu obiara a ɔtse dɛ Daniel
column5: na Azaria: dɛm ntsi wɔbɛkaa ɔhen no n’apamfo ho."

column2: "Na asɛm biara a ɔfa nyansa na ntseasee ho a ɔhen no bisaa hɔn mu no
column3: ohun hɔn dɛ woye mpɛn du sen nkongyaayifo na nkaberkyerfo a wɔwɔ n’ahenman mu no nyinara."

column2: "Na Daniel tsenaa hɔ araa dze kodur ɔhen Sirus n’afe a odzi kan no mu."
